REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0834 reute b f BC-ST-GALLEN-LAUNCHES-50 04-03 0050

TEXT.TITLE: ST GALLEN LAUNCHES 50 TO 60 MLN SWISS FRANC BOND
TEXT.BODY: The Swiss canton of St Gallen is launching a 50 to 60 mln Swiss franc 4-1/4 pct maximum 12-year bond at 100-1/4 pct, lead manager St Gallen Kantonalbank said. Subscriptions close April 15 and payment date is April 30. REUTER
